summary: Barcode label printing feature tested successfully on Orders page. All 6 features verified working correctly: barcode button visibility, error toast for empty orders, print preview window opening, correct label count (1 per item quantity), 2"x1" label format with title/barcode/SKU, and Print/Close buttons functionality.
passed_tests: Barcode button (Barcode icon) visible in Actions column for each order row
Barcode button has correct data-testid format: barcode-order-{order_id}
Barcode button has title='Print item labels'
Barcode button has blue styling: text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-700 hover:bg-blue-50
Clicking barcode on order with 0 items shows error toast 'No items in this order'
No print window opens for order with 0 items
Clicking barcode on order with items opens print preview window
Print preview shows correct number of labels (6 for order with qty 2+3+1)
Labels display product title (truncated if >30 chars)
Labels display barcode SVG using JsBarcode CODE128 format
Labels display barcode number (uses 'barcode' field or falls back to 'sku')
Print button shows 'Print 6 Labels' with correct count
Close button present and functional (closes window)
Success toast shows 'Prepared 6 labels for printing'
critical_code_review_comments: printOrderBarcodes function (Orders.jsx lines 142-319) handles both 'items' and 'line_items' field names
Function handles both 'qty' and 'quantity' field names for item quantity
Labels use item.barcode if available, otherwise falls back to item.sku or generates '{orderNumber}-{itemIdx}'
Label size is correctly set to 2in x 1in using @page CSS rule
JsBarcode library loaded from CDN for barcode generation
